data.prayer: Jesus, help the local leaders in Louang Namtha, Laos to be faithful with what they have been given, whether a little or a lot.
data.verse: Everyone to whom much was given, of him much will be required, and from him to whom they entrusted much, they will demand the more.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Louang Namtha, Laos
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Spirit, please give new believers a yearning to see you praised in Louang Namtha, Laos.
data.verse: Declare his glory among the nations, his marvelous deeds among all peoples.

data.section_summary: On average, 10 people will die without Jesus in the next 100 hours in Louang Namtha, Laos.
data.prayer: Spirit, send your gospel to these.
Jesus, like with the centurion who came to you for his sick servant, please call into your house those who have great faith but are not yet yours in the state of Louang Namtha
data.verse: When Jesus heard these things, he marveled at him, and turning to the crowd that followed him, said, “I tell you, not even in Israel have I found such faith.” And when those who had been sent returned to the house, they found the servant well.

data.prayer: Jesus, you are the great high priest, please make the 3,815 believers in Louang Namtha, Laos a worthy priesthood under you.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.prayer: Father, open to your people a door for the word, to speak the mystery of Christ to the Lamet people.
Father, you said, "The earth belongs to Me and all that is in it". Please, call Louang Namtha, Laos into obedience and eternal life.
data.verse: The earth is Yahweh’s, with its fullness; the world, and those who dwell therein.

data.prayer: Father, help the 3,815 believers in Louang Namtha to know your commands and to do them.
data.verse: For Ezra had devoted himself to the study and observance of the Law of the Lord, and to teaching its decrees and laws in Israel.

data.section_summary:
the state of Louang Namtha, Laos has a population of 150,100.

We estimate Louang Namtha has 3,815 people who might know Jesus, 1,849 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 144,436 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 39 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, please give every church in the state of Louang Namtha a passion to plant another simple church.
